text:
e="preserve">Zulfiqar Ghouri is a Pakistani politician who has been the member of the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab, since May 2013.
Early life and education.
He was born on 31 March 1955 in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sialkot Sialkot].
Political career.
He was elected to the [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Provincial_Assembly_of_the_Punjab Provincial Assembly of the Punjab] as a candidate of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Muslim_League_(N) Pakistan Muslim League (N)] on reserved seat for minorities in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2013 Pakistani general election, 2013].
